Class SymbolTable

java.lang.Object
  SymbolTable

public class SymbolTable
extends java.lang.Object

A class to hold all of the symbols encountered. It is possible to add symbols, along with their information. This information can then be retrieved. Also, a sorted list of the symbols can be returned for printing purposes.

Author:
danielburnett
